actions.name: spawner
actions.description: spawns an object when zone is entered

attributes.name: object_url
attributes.description: URL to JSON that describes what to spawn

attributes.name: position_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity to spawn the object at

attributes.name: lifetime
attributes.description: How long the entity should exist after being spawned (sec, -1 for none)

actions.name: sound
actions.description: plays a sound when zone is entered

attributes.name: audio_url
attributes.description: URL to audio file to be played

attributes.name: position_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity to play the sound at

actions.name: registration_modifier
actions.description: modifies the registration of an object when zone is entered

attributes.name: object_uuid
attributes.description: UUID of the entity that you would like to modify

attributes.name: speed
attributes.description: time we spend transforming our registration, i.e. how long it takes to completely finish moving
